title: Smart City Wayfinding
details: A research and design project focused on simplifying navigation in dense metropolitan environments. The project establishes a unified visual language, accessibility-first routing, and context-aware digital kiosks.

title: AI Learning Assistant
description: Conversational AI to help students learn faster
details: Built for K–12 learning, this AI assistant supports multimodal doubt-solving, personalized learning paths, and parent–teacher insights.
tools: Figma; Python; Unreal Engine; Amazon Lex

title: Food Culture Stories
description: A visual storytelling project exploring food as identity
details: A documentary-style series capturing how food expresses belonging, memory, and cultural roots across regions.
tools: Sony A7 III; Lightroom; Premiere Pro

title: Brand Identity for Aurora Cafe
description: Creating a minimalist yet warm identity for a boutique cafe
details: A full branding system including logo, packaging, menu design, and social media visual language.

title: Metro Mobility App
description: Designing an end-to-end metro travel experience
details: Focuses on route planning, live train status, accessibility options, and station-level information architecture.

title: Immersive Learning Spaces
description: Spatial design research merging classroom and digital environments
details: A study on how multimodal interfaces can transform traditional classrooms into sensory-rich learning ecosystems.
